analysis.key_quote: Please do not reclassify federal workers. By doing so the ordinary people helping our government and society function are vulnerable to arbitrary firings and the systems that protect and serve millions of Americans will be unable to carry out that service.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the reclassification of federal workers, highlighting concerns about arbitrary firings and the impact on the functioning of government services, which aligns with themes of due process and politicization.
